column4: ok, im very frustrated! if anyone can help that'd be great.  i spent close to 30 hours configuring my wireless card and got it to work, then i had a problem updating my repositories, so i spent all day today fixing that.  finally i got it to update repositories properly, and i installed a bunch of multimedia codecs.  Then i restarted gnome at the command line.  The machine locked.  Now it wont boot (it hangs at the Ubuntu graphic and the
i really dont want to have to redo all that work i just did... has anyone seen anything like this?
